sourcesContent:
// src/data/indianDishes.ts

export const indianDishes = [
  {
    id: "paneer-butter-masala",
    title: "Paneer Butter Masala",
    image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1690401767645-595de0e0e5f8?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8N3x8cGFuZWVyJTIwYnV0dGVyJTIwbWFzYWxhJTIyfGVufDB8fDB8fHwwhttps://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/biryani.jpg",
    price: "₹220",
    quantity: "1 bowl",
    description: "Creamy paneer curry in rich tomato gravy",
    rating: 4.5,
    ingredients: ["Paneer", "Butter", "Tomato", "Cream", "Spices"],
    instructions: [
      "Heat butter and sauté onions.",
      "Add tomatoes and spices.",
      "Blend to make gravy.",
      "Add paneer cubes and cream.",
      "Simmer for 5–10 minutes.",
    ],
  },
  {
    id: "biryani",
    title: "Biryani",
    image: "https://plus.unsplash.com/premium_photo-1694141252774-c937d97641da?w=600&auto=format&fit=crop&q=60&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MXx8QmlyeWFuaXxlbnwwfHwwfHx8MA%3D%3Dhttps://cdn.builder.io/api/v1/image/assets/TEMP/biryani2.jpg",
    price: "₹250",
    quantity: "1 bowl",
    description: "Aromatic rice cooked with vegetables and spices.",
    rating: 4.7,
    ingredients: ["Basmati rice", "Veggies", "Spices", "Curd", "Saffron"],
    instructions: [
      "Cook rice separately.",
      "Prepare vegetable gravy.",
      "Layer rice and gravy.",
      "Add saffron milk.",
      "Dum cook for 20 minutes.",
    ],
  },
];
